name: Ball 3D: Soccer Online
description: In Ball 3D you kick where you want! Finally, a soccer game where you have 100% control.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 support (almost all graphics cards) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon 4850 / Intel HD Graphics 4600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
